main event: A witness observed a round, glowing orange object hovering about 50 feet off the ground for approximately 10 minutes before it suddenly accelerated and disappeared in Waterford, Pennsylvania on December 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was round shaped and glowing a deep orange color.
It appeared to be hovering approximately 50 feet off the ground and was maybe 15-20 feet in diameter.
The object slowly moved across the sky from west to east before suddenly accelerating at a very high rate of speed and disappearing from sight.
No sound was heard during the sighting.
The night was clear and visibility was good, and the witness could not explain the object as any natural or man-made phenomenon.
